title: The Complete Destruction Pathway
question_ar: Trace ALL distinct causal chains (minimum 3 hops) from الغفلة (heedlessness) to الكفر (disbelief). For each chain, provide: intermediate behaviors, verse evidence for each link, and tafsir from Ibn Kathir and Qurtubi confirming the causal relationship.
question_en: Trace ALL distinct causal chains (minimum 3 hops) from الغفلة (heedlessness) to الكفر (disbelief). For each chain, provide: intermediate behaviors, verse evidence for each link, and tafsir from Ibn Kathir and Qurtubi confirming the causal relationship.

title: Salvation's Shortest Path
question_ar: What is the minimum number of behavioral transformations required to move from الكبر (arrogance) to الإخلاص (sincerity)? Show the optimal path with verse evidence.
question_en: What is the minimum number of behavioral transformations required to move from الكبر (arrogance) to الإخلاص (sincerity)? Show the optimal path with verse evidence.

title: Methodological Fingerprinting
question_ar: For each of the 5 tafsir sources, identify their top 5 most frequently mentioned behaviors. Do these fingerprints align with known methodological emphases?
question_en: For each of the 5 tafsir sources, identify their top 5 most frequently mentioned behaviors. Do these fingerprints align with known methodological emphases?

title: The Riba Divergence
question_ar: Compare all 5 tafsir interpretations of الربا across every verse where it appears. Create a divergence matrix showing where they agree and disagree.
question_en: Compare all 5 tafsir interpretations of الربا across every verse where it appears. Create a divergence matrix showing where they agree and disagree.

title: Complete Hasad Profile
question_ar: Generate the full 11-dimensional profile for الحسد: organic, situational, systemic, spatial, temporal, agent, source, evaluation, heart-type, consequence, and related behaviors.
question_en: Generate the full 11-dimensional profile for الحسد: organic, situational, systemic, spatial, temporal, agent, source, evaluation, heart-type, consequence, and related behaviors.

title: Organic Axis Dominance
question_ar: Which axis of the 11 dimensions has the most data coverage across all behaviors? Which is most sparse? Quantify per axis.
question_en: Which axis of the 11 dimensions has the most data coverage across all behaviors? Which is most sparse? Quantify per axis.

title: Global Network Statistics
question_ar: Report: node count, edge count, density, average degree, diameter, average clustering coefficient for the complete behavioral graph.
question_en: Report: node count, edge count, density, average degree, diameter, average clustering coefficient for the complete behavioral graph.

title: Centrality Ranking (Degree)
question_ar: Rank all 73 behaviors by degree centrality (total connections). What characterizes high-degree behaviors?
question_en: Rank all 73 behaviors by degree centrality (total connections). What characterizes high-degree behaviors?

title: Complete Heart State Inventory
question_ar: List all heart states mentioned in Quran with their behavioral correlates: قلب سليم، قلب قاسٍ، قلب مريض، قلب ميت، قلب مطمئن، etc.
question_en: List all heart states mentioned in Quran with their behavioral correlates: قلب سليم، قلب قاسٍ، قلب مريض، قلب ميت، قلب مطمئن، etc.

title: Heart State Transition Graph
question_ar: Create a directed graph showing possible transitions between heart states. Which transitions are mentioned in Quran?
question_en: Create a directed graph showing possible transitions between heart states. Which transitions are mentioned in Quran?

title: Complete Agent Inventory
question_ar: List all agent types in QBM with their behavioral capabilities and constraints.
question_en: List all agent types in QBM with their behavioral capabilities and constraints.

title: Agent-Behavior Exclusivity
question_ar: Which behaviors are exclusive to certain agent types? (E.g., only الله has certain attributes)
question_en: Which behaviors are exclusive to certain agent types? (E.g., only الله has certain attributes)

title: Dunya Behavioral Catalog
question_ar: List all behaviors specifically relevant to worldly life (الدنيا) with verse evidence.
question_en: List all behaviors specifically relevant to worldly life (الدنيا) with verse evidence.

title: Akhira Behavioral Catalog
question_ar: List all behaviors specifically relevant to hereafter (الآخرة) with verse evidence.
question_en: List all behaviors specifically relevant to hereafter (الآخرة) with verse evidence.

title: Complete Consequence Inventory
question_ar: List all consequence types mentioned in Quran for behaviors: worldly, barzakh, hereafter, eternal.
question_en: List all consequence types mentioned in Quran for behaviors: worldly, barzakh, hereafter, eternal.

title: Positive Consequence Catalog
question_ar: For all positive behaviors, map their promised rewards with verse evidence.
question_en: For all positive behaviors, map their promised rewards with verse evidence.

title: Behavior Embedding Visualization
question_ar: Create 2D t-SNE visualization of all 73 behaviors. Do semantic clusters match categorical taxonomy?
question_en: Create 2D t-SNE visualization of all 73 behaviors. Do semantic clusters match categorical taxonomy?

title: Nearest Neighbor Accuracy
question_ar: For each behavior, do its nearest embedding neighbors match its graph neighbors? Measure alignment.
question_en: For each behavior, do its nearest embedding neighbors match its graph neighbors? Measure alignment.

title: The Complete Sabr Analysis
question_ar: Using ALL system components, generate the most comprehensive analysis of الصبر ever produced: 11-dimensional profile, all relationships, network position, cross-tafsir treatment, semantic neighbors, heart state correlation, consequences, and transformation pathways.
question_en: Using ALL system components, generate the most comprehensive analysis of الصبر ever produced: 11-dimensional profile, all relationships, network position, cross-tafsir treatment, semantic neighbors, heart state correlation, consequences, and transformation pathways.

title: Behavioral Prescription Generator
question_ar: Given behavioral profile {متكبر، حسود، قاسي القلب}, generate complete Quranically-grounded transformation plan: target behaviors, sequence, intermediate states, expected timeline, with verse and tafsir evidence.
question_en: Given behavioral profile {متكبر، حسود، قاسي القلب}, generate complete Quranically-grounded transformation plan: target behaviors, sequence, intermediate states, expected timeline, with verse and tafsir evidence.
